title: Random Account Suspension

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Without Even Being In A Game On My Account In Several Days, Maybe Even Weeks I Have Received A Suspension. The Notification Box Informs Me That I Have Been Sent A Email To Notify Of The Suspension But I Have Received No Emails In A Great Period Of Time. I Logged On Yesterday And And All Was Well (I Didn't Proceed To Play A Game) But Now Today This Seems To Appear.   https://gyazo.com/ef5639dafc3a1af242e4bbdc65a78aa2

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I've Taken It Upon My Self And Found Out The Problem And Resolution. Would Anyone Happen Know How Long A Chargeback Take To Go Throw And For My Account To Be Fully Returned?

replies.body:
Hey ChezzDropAndRoll,

It should take about 4-7 days, from what I've seen. If it's not resolved within 7 days of you sending Riot Games Player Support all of the information they need, ping me and I'll double check on the status for you.
